skills.title: Efficiency
skills.description: Learn tricks and tips on how to drive for better energy efficiency, whether it's electric or combustion. Improve your fuel economy and reduce your environmental impact with this course.

skills.title: Mechanics
skills.description: Understand mechanical aspects of the car like Rev Matching, torque, gear ratios, and more. Get a deeper understanding of how your car works, which can help you take better care of it and resolve issues when they arise.

skills.title: Attention and Safety
skills.description: Learn to pay attention and maintain safety, with fun exercises like a braking calculation system: Try to lift your foot off the accelerator at the exact moment to stop the car as close to the red light as possible without going over it.

skills.title: Dynamic Driving
skills.description: Learn how to efficiently handle your vehicle under various driving conditions. This includes driving on wet or slippery roads, handling steering in tight corners, and techniques for smooth driving.

skills.title: Control Recovery
skills.description: Learn how to regain control of the vehicle in emergency situations. This includes recovering control after a skid, the correct maneuver during a tire blowout, and how to handle situations of abrupt braking.
